page.title: 12Kettlesing - An Honest Crust
page.content: Apart from the M.O.D./U.S. base at Menwith Hill, employment in the block is mainly agricultural, e.g., farming, agricultural contracting, egg processing at Springfield Farm; or commuting to jobs mainly in the pro- fessional and commercial sector in the neighboring connurbations, e.g., banking and insurance. However, there are a significant number of self- employed people especially in the higher professional classes, e.g., antique consultant, interior designer, club secretary. Of the rest, the majority would be retired. Spending of incomes, especially through retail outfits, is done mainly in Harrogate, with food shopping through large super markets and cash and carries. The only shop/Post Office closed earlier this year. Two travelling retail vans (but- cher and greengrocer) supply needs.
